bibl.title: Kallimachos and the Seleukid Apollo.
Transactions and Proceedings of the American Philological Association

bibl.note: Ptolemaic and Seleukid (bad) relations. - On not going to Didyma. - Kallimachos's interest in Didyma. - Phrygios of Miletos and Pieria of Myous (Aetia 3 frr. 80-83 Pf.). - Bathykles' cup (Iambus 1). - Branchos (fr. 229 / Iambus 17?) [P. Oxy. XVIII, 2172 (= M.-P.3 222; LDAB 468)]. - ""Ptolemaic"" Didyma? - Didyma in perspective. - Didyma reconsidered. - Trashing the Seleukid Nile. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Michael Brumbaugh, Kallimachos and the Seleukid Apollo.

Ptolemaic and Seleukid (bad) relations. - On not going to Didyma. - Kallimachos's interest in Didyma. - Phrygios of Miletos and Pieria of Myous (Aetia 3 frr. 80-83 Pf.). - Bathykles' cup (Iambus 1). - Branchos (fr. 229 / Iambus 17?) [P. Oxy. XVIII, 2172 (= M.-P.3 222; LDAB 468)]. - ""Ptolemaic"" Didyma? - Didyma in perspective. - Didyma reconsidered. - Trashing the Seleukid Nile. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
